privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.welcomeText: Welcome to Feed & Sleep App ("we," "our," "us"). This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our app.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.description: Our app does not collect or process personal data directly. However, third-party services such as AdMob may collect certain information, including:

deviceInfo.title: Device Information:
deviceInfo.text: Such as your device ID, operating system, and IP address.

usageData.title: Usage Data:
usageData.text: Information about your interactions with ads.

locationData.title: Location Data:
locationData.text: Approximate location (e.g., country or region) based on your IP address.

section2.title: 2. How AdMob Uses Your Information
section2.description: AdMob, a third-party advertising service, collects and uses data to provide personalized and non-personalized ads. Data collected may include:
section2.demographicData: Demographic and interest data for personalized ads.
section2.learnMore: You can learn more about AdMob's privacy practices here:

section3.title: 3. Your Choices
section3.description: You have the option to opt-out of personalized advertising:

android.title: On Android:
android.text: Go to "Settings" > "Google" > "Ads" and enable "Opt out of Ads Personalization."

ios.title: On iOS:
ios.text: Go to "Settings" > "Privacy" > "Advertising" and enable "Limit Ad Tracking."

section4.title: 4. Data Retention
section4.description: We do not collect or store any personal data. AdMob retains data in accordance with its privacy policy.

section5.title: 5. Security
section5.description: We do not process or store data, but we ensure that AdMob complies with applicable privacy regulations.

section6.title: 6. Changes to This Privacy Policy
section6.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page.

section7.title: 7. Contact Us
section7.description: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

support.title: Support
support.subtitle: We’re here to help! If you have any questions or need assistance, you can find support below.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.description: Here’s how you can get started with the app:
gettingStarted.item1Description: Ensure that you've installed the app from the App Store (iOS) or Google Play (Android).
gettingStarted.item2Description: When you first open the app, you will go through a short welcome tour where you can set up preferences for tracking your baby’s feeding, sleep, and diaper changes.
gettingStarted.item3Description: Begin adding your baby’s feeding, sleep, and diaper change data to start tracking milestones.

troubleshooting.title: Troubleshooting
troubleshooting.description: If you encounter any issues with the app, try the following solutions:
troubleshooting.item1Description: Try restarting the app. If that doesn't help, uninstall and reinstall the app from the App Store or Google Play.
troubleshooting.item2Description: Make sure your device has enough storage space. If the issue persists, please contact support.
troubleshooting.item3Description: Ensure that the app has the necessary permissions to run in the background, especially on iOS.

contact.title: Contact Support
contact.description: If you're unable to find the answer to your problem or need additional help, feel free to reach out to us:

feedback.title: Give Us Feedback
feedback.description: We love hearing from our users! If you have suggestions or would like to provide feedback about the app, please don't hesitate to reach out.
feedback.rateDescription: If you enjoy using the app, please consider leaving a review on the App Store or Google Play.
